body:
Hallo my name is ImzKoolerz0013 or KOOL001, and I have been on this network for almost 2 yrs and more on other accounts. 
I like minecraft, but I play a lot of xbox games. (If you wanna add me tell the username in response)
I play factions on a server that I am really good at(if you wanna join pm me or somethin idk :(
If someone wants to play with me on a different server or somethin, cuz of some reasons I do not want to get in to. 
Maybe I will be back in like the summer. If anyone wanna talk about life or something or wanna talk about depression(I am depressed with a type of tongue disease and lungs.)

So hi Avicus Forums!!!!
Nise to meet u.
'

Kool001
